mapper.insert: INSERT INTO footballMatching.business_user (id, password, name, phoneNumber, field_id, joinDate) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{name}, #{phoneNumber}, #{field_name}, #{joinDate});
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM footballMatching.business_user WHERE name = #{name} AND phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber} AND field_id = #{field_id};
SELECT a.id, a.password, a.name, a.phoneNumber, b.name as field_name FROM footballMatching.business_user as a LEFT JOIN footballMatching.field as b on a.field_id = b.id;
